comment: The ordering of the field of complex numbers. (Note that this is not actually an ordering on ` CC ` , but we put it in the structure anyway because restricting to ` RR ` does not affect this component, so that ` ( CCfld |``s RR ) ` is an ordered field even though ` CCfld ` itself is not.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2017.)
